削.definition: to pare; to reduce; to remove; Taiwan pr. [xue4]

削弱.definition: to weaken; to impair; to cripple

削減.definition: to cut down; to reduce; to lower

削瘦.definition: thin; lean; slender; skinny; (of cheeks) hollow

削職.definition: demotion; to have one's job cut

削足適履.definition: to cut the feet to fit the shoes (idiom); to force sth to fit (as to a Procrustean bed); impractical or inelegant solution

削除.definition: to remove; to eliminate; to delete

削髮.definition: to shave one's head; fig. to become a monk or nun; to take the tonsure
